import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; const Navbar = () => { const [navbar, setNavBar] = useState(false); const changeBackground = () => { if(window.scrollY >= 80) { setNavBar(true) } else { setNavBar(false) } console.log(window.scrollY) } window.addEventListener('scroll', changeBackground); return ( <>
Navbar

); }; export default Navbar;
